sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Caterpillar topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.4%.
Year to date, Caterpillar has lost about 4.9% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Travelers Companies, trading down 0.5%.
Travelers Companies is lower by about 4.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot, trading down 0.3%, and Exxon Mobil, trading up 1.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
